DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator compare effectiveness two relatively new video laryngoscope , McGrath MAC ( Covidien , Dublin Ireland ) King Vision ( King Systems , Noblesville , IN ) , practitioner experience airway management limited exposure two device . Our hypothesis , McGrath MAC device would require few intubation attempt short intubation time King Vision perform novice user .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Study McGrath MAC Video Laryngoscope With King Vision
DOC.criteria: All interested airway provider ( Residents , Attendings , Certified Nurse Anesthetist Student Registered Nurse Anesthetist ) eligible include . All patient difficult airway determine history physical exam ( limited oral opening , limited cervical extension , recede chin , Mallampati class III IV ) .
